data.title: Advanced Surface Engineering Division (ASED)
data.text:
Welcome to the Advanced Surface Engineering Divsion of AVS

The Advanced Surface Engineering Division (ASED) of the American Vacuum Society (AVS) provides a continuing forum for fostering the understanding of advanced surface engineering technologies. ASED brings together scientists and technologists from academia and industry, thereby merging research with application and promoting coating integration in materials design and engineering.

ASED organizes and supports conferences, symposia and workshops, to promote discussion of basic aspects of surfaceâ€™s science, technology and engineering. Areas of interest are best described by the list of Symposia in the annual International Conference on Metallurgical Coatings and Thin Films (ICMCTF).

Please send your nominations for the

R. F. Bunshah Award

Bill Sproul Award

ICMCTF Graduate Student Award

for the ICMCTF electronically to the ASED Awards Committee, asedawards@avs.org before the Abstract deadline to this event.

Please send your nominations for the

ASED Young Investigator Award

for the AVS Symposium electronically to the ASED Awards Committee, asedawards@avs.org before the Abstract deadline to this event every year.
